DOC.brief_summary: Ultrasonography (US) is an operator depended image modality that is difficult to reproduce and interpret by others. Competence of the US operator is crucial for reliable diagnostics but no evidence-based certification of head and neck US skills has been developed. Investigators conducted an experimental study aimed to explore diagnostic accuracy and establish validity evidence for certification standards in surgeon-performed ultrasonography.
DOC.brief_title: Certification Standards and Diagnostic Accuracy for Surgeon-performed Ultrasonography
DOC.criteria: 1. Ultrasonographyexperienced surgeons Board certified otolaryngologist Daily use of head and neck Ultrasonography 2. Ultrasonography novices: Medical doctor during internship experience with head and neck Ultrasonography experience with head and neck surgery
